CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 30, 1946, pg. 27, reads: "TOP HATTERS RE-UNITE - Members of the Top Hatters Club, a young men's social group, were re-united at a banquet last Thursday evening. Most of the members served in Army and had not seen each other for several years.  Lft. to right are, seated: Clyde Hampton, William Battles, William Marable; standing: Fate Marable, Jack Williams, Stanford Brown, James Tyler and Thomas Croom. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Top Hatters Club members, seated from left: Clyde Hampton, William Battles, William Marable; standing: Fate Marable Jr., Jack Williams, Stanford Brown, James Tyler, and Thomas Croom, posed in domestic interior
